title: Strands of Elven Hair (9R22)
text:

Game Text:	To play, spot a Dwarf. When you play this possession, add 2 [Elven] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this possession or remove an [Elven] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [Dwarven] or [Elven] card, you may take it into hand.
Rarity:	R
